description: Number of semi-regular digraphs on n nodes.
comments: The directed graphs in this sequence need not be connected, but each node must have out-degree 2. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Apr 09 2015
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: S. A. Choudum, K. R. Parthasarathy, Semi-regular relations and digraphs, Nederl. Akad. Wetensch. Proc. Ser. A. {75}=Indag. Math. 34 (1972), 326-334.
Sean A. Irvine, Illustration of A003286(3).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
